oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Federal Building and Post Office in Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “U. S. Federal Building and Post Office, Memphis, Tennessee.” Color image.

“Miss Laura Trotter -- 311 E. 5th St. -- Newport -- Kentucky -- Nashville Tenn -- Tues. 9:00 AM. June 25 -- Yesterday we decided we -- couldn’t make the -- Smokies. So started -- toward Nashville to -- see the Hermitage which -- we missed last time -- we were here. Stopped -- at LaBundy’s. talked to -- Gerald – other fellow in army -- in Washington -- Maria"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Federal buildings; post office;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: A “Colourpicture” Publication, Cambridge, Mass., U.S.A.; Collection processed by Angela Price
